query.name: getStudyEventAndFormMetaByStudyId
query.sql: select distinct sed.oc_oid as sed_oid, cv.oc_oid as cv_oid, sed.name as sed_name, sed.repeating as sed_repeating, sed."type" as sed_type, cv.name as cv_name, edc.required_crf as cv_required, crf.name as crf_name from study_event_definition sed, event_definition_crf edc, crf, crf_version cv where sed.study_id = ? and sed.status_id = 1 and sed.study_event_definition_id = edc.study_event_definition_id and edc.status_id = 1 and edc.crf_id = crf.crf_id and crf.status_id = 1 and crf.crf_id = cv.crf_id and cv.status_id = 1

query.name: getItemGroupAndItemMetaByCRFVersionOID
query.sql: select distinct cv.oc_oid as crf_version_oid, case when igm.item_id > 0 then ig.oc_oid else (select distinct iig.oc_oid from item_group iig where iig.name = 'Ungrouped' and iig.crf_id = cv.crf_id) end as item_group_oid, item.oc_oid as item_oid, rs.response_set_id, case when igm.item_id > 0 then ig.name else 'Ungrouped' end as item_group_name, item.name as item_name, item.item_data_type_id, ifm.header, ifm.left_item_text, ifm.right_item_text, ifm.required as item_required, ifm.regexp, ifm.regexp_error_msg, ifm.width_decimal, rs.response_type_id, rs.options_text, rs.options_values, rs.label as response_label, igm.header as item_group_header, item.description as item_description from crf_version cv join item_form_metadata ifm on cv.crf_version_id = ifm.crf_version_id join item on ifm.item_id = item.item_id join response_set rs on ifm.response_set_id = rs.response_set_id left join item_group_metadata igm on ifm.item_id = igm.item_id and cv.crf_version_id = igm.crf_version_id left join item_group ig on igm.item_group_id = ig.item_group_id and cv.crf_id = ig.crf_id where cv.oc_oid = ?
